resources.string:
ScrollView is a layout container that allows its child views to be scrollable vertically. It\'s useful when you have content that exceeds the screen height and want to provide the user with a way to scroll through it.
ScrollView enables vertical scrolling for its SINGLE child view.
String resources are located at `res/values/string.xml`.
